blogPost.excerpt: You don't need to be a 'Nerd' or 'Points Guy' to maximize your finances. 💳 Clyde shows you what each credit card is worth to you based on your transaction data. It's instant, personalized, and transparent.
blogPost.body: You don't need to be a 'Nerd' or 'Points Guy' to maximize your finances. 💳 Clyde shows you what each credit card is worth to you based on your transaction data. It's instant, personalized, and transparent.
blogPost.title: Clyde - Finds your best card based on how you spend
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 你不需要成为一个 "书呆子 "或 "积分男"，就能将你的财务状况最大化。💳 Clyde根据您的交易数据，向您展示每张信用卡的价值。它是即时的、个性化的、透明的。
localize.tagline: 根据您的消费情况，找到您的最佳卡片

localize.description: 你不需要成爲一個 "書呆子 "或 "積分男"，就能將你的財務狀況最大化。💳 Clyde根據您的交易數據，向您展示每張信用卡的價值。它是即時的、個性化的、透明的。
localize.tagline: 根據您的消費情況，找到您的最佳卡片

next.excerpt: A web-based design tool to generate unique SVG design assets for websites, social media, blog posts, pitch decks, and more! Choose a visual from our growing list of generators, customize, randomize, and export it as an SVG or a PNG.
next.title: Haikei - Generate unique SVG design assets in just a few seconds

localize.description: 一个基于网络的设计工具，可以为网站、社交媒体、博客文章、广告牌等生成独特的SVG设计资产。从我们不断增长的生成器列表中选择一个视觉效果，自定义，随机化，并将其导出为SVG或PNG。
localize.tagline: 只需几秒钟就能生成独特的SVG设计资产。

localize.description: 一個基於網絡的設計工具，可以爲網站、社交媒體、博客文章、廣告牌等生成獨特的SVG設計資產。從我們不斷增長的生成器列表中選擇一個視覺效果，自定義，隨機化，並將其導出爲SVG或PNG。
localize.tagline: 只需幾秒鐘就能生成獨特的SVG設計資產。
